survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from participants of professional certification programs to evaluate their effectiveness, relevance, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: Which professional certification program did you recently complete?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture certifications not listed. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly for easy selection.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a dropdown menu for answer options to save space, with an open-text field for 'Other' responses.

script.question_text: Which professional certification program did you recently complete?

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall quality of the certification program?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for consistency. Consider adding a 'Not applicable' option if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection. Ensure the scale is visually balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall quality of the certification program?

questions.question_text: Which aspects of the certification program did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture varied feedback. Include an 'Other' option for additional insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Add an open-text field for 'Other' responses.

script.question_text: Which aspects of the certification program did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this certification program to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: This is a standard Net Promoter Score (NPS) question. Use a single-choice scale for clarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection. Ensure the scale is visually balanced.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this certification program to a colleague?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future iterations of this certification program?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended questions provide qualitative insights. Keep the field optional to encourage honest feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a textarea for open-ended responses. Allow for long-form answers.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future iterations of this certification program?
